title: Delia
brief_description: Two friends at boarding school ponder over who would miss them if they died - with unexpected and horrifying results. Cast includes Natasha Riedel and Simon Dumbleton. (Awards: Winner, Best Independent Film, Best Actress, Queensland New Filmmakers Awards, 1999)
